dmca.title: Christian Scientists Don't Turn the Other Cheek on Copied Citations
dmca.body:
Dear Mr. [private]:

We represent The Christian Science Board of Directors of The First Church of Christ, Scientist and its publishing arm, The Christian Science Publishing Society ("CSPS"). It has come to our client's attention that you have begun to distribute full text versions of the Weekly Bible Lesson published by CSPS, without the consent of our client.  You have also begun to distribute software which allows users to copy the Bible Lesson citations directly from the spirituality.com site on the World Wide Web, without authorization. The infringing texts and software are being distributed under the auspices of an organization calling itself the Christian Science Notification Network, located on the World Wide Web at.   

Please be advised that each Bible Lesson embodies an original and creative selection and arrangement of citations, and may only be reproduced or distributed with the consent of CSPS pursuant to the Copyright Act of 1976, 17 U.S.C.
dmca.principal_name: The First Church of Christ, Scientist
